00180 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00181 /* group table APIs */
00182 
00183 /*
00184    The Group Table contains one entry for each Group.  The table is indexed
00185    by the groupId which identifies the group entry.  Data is encoded into the groupId to specify the OF-DPA
00186    group entry type and information required by OF-DPA to configure the datapath.
00187 
00188    The groupId encoding method is:
00189 
00190    L2 Interface, L2 Rewrite types:
00191         (MSB to LSB) 4 bits encode the Group Table Entry type |12 bits of VLAN ID | 16 bits of port identifier
00192 
00193    L2 Multicast, L2 Flood, L3 Multicast, and L3 Interface types:
00194         (MSB to LSB) 4 bits encode the Group Table Entry type |12 bits of VLAN ID | 16 bits of index
00195 
00196    L3 Unicast and L3 ECMP types:
00197         (MSB to LSB) 4 bits encode the Group Table Entry type | 28 bits of index
00198 
00199 */
00200 
00201 /* APIs for getting/setting group IDs -- set APIs must set the type first. */
00202 
00203 /*****************************************************************/
00214 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaGroupTypeGet(uint32_t groupId, uint32_t *type) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00215 
00216 /*****************************************************************/
00230 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaGroupAdd(ofdpaGroupEntry_t *group) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00231 
00232 /*****************************************************************/

00244

00509 
00510 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00511 /* Event APIs */
00512 
00513 /*
00514    Asynchronous events: Have classified them into two broad category:
00515    Packet In : Packet received from the hardware to be sent to the controller
00516    Control messages: Events like Port creation, deletion, link state, Flow age and Error
00517 
00518    The packet In events can have a high frequency, so we want to ensure that there is
00519    separate control for polling of these two event types to give flexibility to the agent
00520 */
00521 
00522 /*****************************************************************/
00536 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaClientPktSockBind(void) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00537 
00538 /*****************************************************************/
00545 int ofdpaClientPktSockFdGet(void) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00546 
00547 /*****************************************************************/
00579 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaPktReceive(struct timeval *timeout, ofdpaPacket_t *pkt) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00580 
00581 /*****************************************************************/
00594 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaPortEventNextGet(ofdpaPortEvent_t *eventData) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
00595

00609

00623 OFDPA_ERROR_t ofdpaFlowEventNextGet(ofdpaFlowEvent_t *eventData) LIB_DLL_EXPORTED;
